pragma solidity >=0.6.0 <0.9.0;

// import "hardhat/console.sol";

contract SStoreCallWithValue {
    uint[100] public values;

    constructor() {
        values[1] = 42;
    }

    function initStorage() public {
        values[1] = 42;
    }

    function clearStorageAndSendValue() public payable {
        values[1] = 0;
        payable(address(this)).transfer(1);
    }

    fallback () external payable { }
}
end

account_new acc1 20000000

# Deploy ValueTransfer

transaction_build tx01
    sender acc1
    receiverAddress 00
    value 0
    data 
    gas 2000000
    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions tx01
    build

block_connect b01
assert_best b01

# call clearStorageAndSendValue()

transaction_build tx02
    sender acc1
    nonce 1
    contract tx01   # created in tx01
    value 1
    data 5b3f8140
    gas 6800000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02
    gasLimit 6800000
    build
